Temperature: Role: Feature, Description: The temperature in degrees Celsius, ranging from extreme cold to extreme heat.
Humidity: Role: Feature, Description: The humidity percentage, including values above 100% to introduce outliers.
Wind Speed: Role: Feature, Description: The wind speed in kilometers per hour, with a range including unrealistically high values.
Precipitation (%): Role: Feature, Description: The precipitation percentage, including outlier values.
Cloud Cover: Role: Feature, Description: The cloud cover description.
Atmospheric Pressure: Role: Feature, Description: The atmospheric pressure in hPa, covering a wide range.
UV Index: Role: Feature, Description: The UV index, indicating the strength of ultraviolet radiation.
Season: Role: Feature, Description: The season during which the data was recorded.
Visibility (km): Role: Feature, Description: The visibility in kilometers, including very low or very high values.
Location: Role: Feature, Description: The type of location where the data was recorded.
Weather_Type: Role: Target, Description: The target variable for classification, indicating the weather type.
